sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card
    class="mx-auto"
    width="300"
    flat
  >
    <v-list v-model:opened="open">
      <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-home" title="Home"></v-list-item>
      <v-divider inset></v-divider>
      <v-list-group value="Users">
        <template v-slot:activator="{ props }">
          <v-list-item
            v-bind="props"
            prepend-icon="mdi-account-circle"
            title="Users"
          ></v-list-item>
        </template>

        <v-list-group value="Admin">
          <template v-slot:activator="{ props }">
            <v-list-item
              v-bind="props"
              title="Admin"
            ></v-list-item>
          </template>

          <v-list-item
            v-for="([title, icon], i) in admins"
            :key="i"
            :title="title"
            :prepend-icon="icon"
            :value="title"
          ></v-list-item>
        </v-list-group>

        <v-list-group value="Actions">
          <template v-slot:activator="{ props }">
            <v-list-item
              v-bind="props"
              title="Actions"
            ></v-list-item>
          </template>

          <v-list-item
            v-for="([title, icon], i) in cruds"
            :key="i"
            :value="title"
            :title="title"
            :prepend-icon="icon"
          ></v-list-item>
        </v-list-group>
      </v-list-group>
      <v-divider inset></v-divider>
      
    </v-list>
    
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({
      open: ['Users'],
      admins: [
        ['Management', 'mdi-account-multiple-outline'],
        ['Settings', 'mdi-cog-outline'],
      ],
      cruds: [
        ['Create', 'mdi-plus-outline'],
        ['Read', 'mdi-file-outline'],
        ['Update', 'mdi-update'],
        ['Delete', 'mdi-delete'],
      ],
      features:[
        []
      ]
    }),
  }
</script>

<style>

</style>



<!-- <template>
  <v-container>
    <v-list>
      <v-list>
        <v-card flat>
          <v-list-item 
          prepend-icon="mdi-view-dashboard" 
          title="Home" 
          router to="/"></v-list-item>
        </v-card>
      </v-list>          
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-expansion-panel>
        <v-list
        v-for="user in users"
        :key="user.title">
          <v-list-item-icon>{{user.userPicture}}</v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-title>{{user.title}}</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list>
      </v-expansion-panel>
    <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-list-group>
        <v-list-item 
        v-for="item in items"
        :key="item.title"
        router :to="item.route">
          <v-icon>{{item.icon}}</v-icon>
          <v-list-title>{{item.title}}</v-list-title>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-group>
    </v-list>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>

  name: "Side-bar",
  data() {
      return {
        users:[
            {userPicture:"mdi-admin",
            title:"admin",
            route:"",
            },
        ],
        items:[
            {icon: "mdi-account-multiple-outline",
            title: "Management",

        ]
      }
  },
